Near the old well by the lighthouse,

I heard a voice piercing the air 
from the direction of the graveyard,

The other day, I heard the knights 
were going on patrol, so I decided to follow them 
to see if it was true. But those guys—

they didn't even notice! Now, with the knights

to Kinoza for a hot spring. A

This is a story from long ago, 
when I had a dear comrade. 
Day after day, we tirelessly hunted 
monsters together until we met that beast— 
we should have only dealt with monsters 
that matched our own strength. 
Even now, such regrets haunt my heart.

artist, wandering from place to place, 
sketching beautiful things. This area is 
a treasure trove of ancient ruins— 
the contrast of stone corridors and monsters— 
monsters?! If I sketch here, no matter how 
many lives I have, it won't be enough!

These caves are remarkable— 
there are so many shapes here 
that I've never seen in Lestania— 
it's wonderful! This truly feels 
like a utopia! But every cave is 
full of monsters, turning it 
into a den of horrors, which is 
quite disappointing.

a carefree attitude. Sure, the clear stream 
flowing amidst the rugged rocks is magnificent, 
and the birds' songs fill the heart, but

魔物たちが出現しているらしい
column4:
In <NAME AREA> right now, 
there seems to be a suspicious presence
of enemy creatures.

column3:
調査隊駐屯地諸君に告ぐ――
調査を邪魔せし鉄壁の魔物が現れた
なお、騎士団はすでに応援の部隊を派遣した
覚者隊の諸君も早急に応援を頼む
先行した調査隊は壊滅状態の模様――
column4:
To all at the survey base— 
A relentless monster has shown up, 
obstructing our investigation efforts. 
The knights have already sent a backup unit. 
Arisen Corps, we urgently need your help. 
The forward survey team seems to be decimated—

column3: 遭遇した魔物を討伐する
column4: Defeat the encountered demons

column3: 残る魔物を討伐する
column4: Defeat the remaining demons
